title: #64: The Heart of Nuba Director Ken Carlson and the Victims in Sudan
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) discuss the documentary The Heart of Nuba with its director Ken Carlson. The movie sheds light on the victims in the remote Nuba mountains in Sudan and the extraordinary work of Dr. Tom Catena.

#HeartOfNuba
